title: Mou Shu Pork Wraps
ingredients: ['1 pork fillet, sliced into strips', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '2cm (3/4 in) piece root ginger, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '275g (10 oz) thinly sliced pak choi', '1 red pepper, sliced', '10 large button mushrooms, julienned', '275g (10 oz) beansprouts', '4 tablespoons Chinese rice wine, or sake', '3 tablespoons hoisin sauce', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '8 flour tortilla wraps']
